about_the_game:
Fight for survival and supremacy in an unforgiving and lawless landscape. Scour your surroundings for weapons, ammunition, base supplies and vehicles. Build a base, grow and fortify it, amass a vast arsenal of weapons and dominate invading players. Raid other player's bases with your spoils of war and grow your empire.

Weapons

A large variety of weapons a dynamic attachment system including silencers, extended mags, grips and optics that allow you to build a loadout that suits your playstyle.

Vehicles

Wide variety of land, sea and air vehicles that allow you to traverse the expansive landscape fast and safely.

Base Building

Claim your territory and then build your base to protect your territory.

Trader Zones

Sell unwanted loot taken from other players to earn money and use it to buy better weapons, more ammo or upgrades to turn your base into a fortress.

content_descriptors.notes: This is a first person shooter game and will feature the use of firearms.

name: Dissension Survival

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4 core 8 threads 3.6Ghz +
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or AMD RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
